critique: This document is an executive order amending a previous executive order regarding allowances for quarters and subsistence for enlisted men. It adjusts the language to specify that allowances are 'at not to exceed' certain amounts. This appears to be a minor technical correction. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, expansion of executive power, federalism implications, security vs. liberty concerns, economic regulation changes, or social inclusion considerations. Therefore, all scores are initially set to 0.
